definition: outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: A distinct mass or portion of matter, especially a large one.
sentences.chinese: 物體很明顯的重量或部分，尤指一個大物體。

sentences.english: A name, especially a descriptive nickname or acquired through usage over a period of time.
sentences.chinese: 名，尤指一描述性的或因一段時間的習慣而得的諢名。

sentences.english: The breeding of animals or growing of plants, especially to produce improved stock.
sentences.chinese: 對動物的飼養或植物的種植，尤指爲了產生改良品種。

sentences.english: Medical characterized by catatonia especially either rigidity or extreme laxness of limbs.
sentences.chinese: 具有緊張症特徵的，尤指四肢的極端僵硬或鬆弛。

sentences.english: A dressed piece of wood, especially a beam in a structure.
sentences.chinese: 一塊整齊的木料，尤指房屋結構中的橫樑。

sentences.english: Cellulose acetate or any of various products, especially fibers, derived from it.
sentences.chinese: 醋酸纖維素或其多種製品，尤指從中提取的纖維質。

sentences.english: A short street, especially a wide alley walled by buildings on three sides.
sentences.chinese: 短街，死巷短街，尤指三面由建築物圍繞的寬的。

sentences.english: A hobo, especially one who carries a bedroll.
sentences.chinese: 流浪者，遊民流浪漢，尤指帶着鋪蓋卷。

sentences.english: A thin fragile edge, especially a tapering edge of a board.
sentences.chinese: 十分薄而易碎的邊緣，尤指木板尖細的邊緣。

sentences.english: To compliment excessively and often insincerely especially in order to win favor.
sentences.chinese: 尤指爲了博得歡心的過分地且常常爲不真誠地讚揚。

sentences.english: A preference or an inclination, especially one that inhibits impartial judgment.
sentences.chinese: 偏好或傾向，尤指妨礙公平判定滴偏見。

sentences.english: To hug, especially with great force.
sentences.chinese: 緊抱，尤指強有力地擁抱。

sentences.english: A green vegetable or herb used in salad, especially lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 沙拉中使用的綠色蔬菜或食用植物，尤指萵苣。

sentences.english: Any of several deciduous, Asian trees of the genus Ailanthus, especially the tree - of - heaven.
sentences.chinese: 臭椿，樗一種亞洲樗屬落葉樹，尤指樗。

sentences.english: To train by instruction and practice, especially to teach self-control to.
sentences.chinese: 通過教學和實踐訓練，尤指學會自我剋制。

sentences.english: Any dry, dehiscent fruit, especially a legume or follicle.
sentences.chinese: 任何開裂的乾果，尤指莢果或蓇葖果。

definition: to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to refer to/to be used in place of
